text: Sloat is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Ann Sloat (b. 1928), Canadian politician *Donald Sloat, Medal of Honor recipient *John D. Sloat (1781–1867), American naval commodore who claimed California for the US *Lefty Sloat (1918–2003), American baseball player *Micah Sloat (b. 1981), American actor and musician *Taylor Sloat (b. 1992), American football player
title: Sloat (surname)
